sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Glide One Extend is now installed as part of the platform and has dependencies on Flow Designer, which is installed after the OneExtend plugin. This fix script repairs the OneExtend plugin to ensure that the Flow Designer artifacts are installed as expected.</description> <name>Repair OneExtend Plugin</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var pluginName = 'com.glide.one_extend'; var pluginManager = new GlidePluginManager(); if (pluginManager.isActive(pluginName)) pluginManager.repairPlugin(pluginName);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-07-11 18:04:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c16c4f10530031103296ddeeff7b1256</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Repair OneExtend Plugin</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">ad7df0203c75311068bcf327dfe37f75</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c16c4f10530031103296ddeeff7b1256</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-07-11 18:04:23</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
